hero.title: Banking, simplified and intelligent.
hero.subtitle: Manage your finances with powerful tools, instant transactions, and top-tier security.

login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your credentials to access your account.
login.verifyEmailError: Please verify your email before logging in.

register.title: Open an account with AmCbunq
register.description: Sign up to start managing your finances.
register.termsPrompt: By creating an account, you agree to our
register.emailInUseError: This email address is already in use by another account.
register.permissionDeniedError: Missing or insufficient permissions. Please check your Firestore security rules.

verifyEmail.title: Verify Your Email Address
verifyEmail.description: We've sent a verification link to {email}. Please click the link to activate your account.
verifyEmail.emailSentDescription: A new verification email has been sent to your address.
verifyEmail.checkSpam: Also, remember to check your spam folder.
verifyEmail.verificationSuccessDescription: Your email has been successfully verified. Please log in with your new credentials to enjoy your banking experience.
verifyEmail.expiredLinkError: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new link.

dashboard.title: Dashboard

aiAssistant.title: AI Financial Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Get personalized insights and recommendations based on your transaction history.
aiAssistant.noInsights: Could not generate insights at this time.

dashboard.ourServicesDescription: Discover our range of services designed to help you grow your wealth.
dashboard.carbonFootprintDescription: Track the environmental impact of your spending and contribute to a greener planet.

verificationBanner.title: Verification Pending
verificationBanner.pending_description: Your documents are under review. This usually takes 24 to 48 hours.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.welcomeDescription: Your account has been successfully created. You can now explore all the features we have to offer. Please make sure to complete your profile verification at your earliest convenience to unlock all functionalities.
notifications.verificationDescription: Please complete your identity verification. To comply with financial regulations and ensure the security of your account, this is a necessary step to access features like transfers and card services.

accounts.title: My Accounts
accounts.totalBalanceDescription: Total assets across all your accounts.
accounts.internalTransferDescription: Move funds between your accounts instantly.

transfers.title: Make a Transfer
transfers.newTransferDescription: Send money to any bank account.
transfers.addBeneficiaryDescription: Enter the details of the new beneficiary. This will save them for future transfers.
transfers.beneficiaryAddedDescription: has been successfully added to your beneficiaries list.
transfers.unverified_description: Complete your identity verification to send and receive money.

cards.title: My Cards
cards.settingsDescription: Manage your card settings and security.
cards.orderCardDescription: Confirm that you would like to order a new physical card. It will be sent to your registered address.
cards.cardOrderedDescription: Your new card is on its way.
cards.setLimitDescription: Enter a new monthly spending limit for your card.
cards.viewPinDescription: For your security, this PIN will be shown for a limited time.
cards.unverified_description: Complete your identity verification to order new cards and manage your card settings.

history.title: Transaction History
history.noTransactions: No transactions found for the selected period.

budgets.title: My Budgets
budgets.createBudgetDescription: Set a name and a monthly amount for your new budget category.
budgets.budgetCreatedDescription: Your new budget '{name}' has been created.

iban.title: My IBAN Details
iban.description: Use these details to receive money from other accounts.
iban.copiedDescription: has been copied to your clipboard.
iban.unverified_description: Complete your identity verification to view and use your IBAN details for receiving payments.

profile.title: Personal Information
profile.description: Update your personal details here. This information is required for account verification.

security.title: Security
security.description: Update your password and manage your account security.
security.reauthenticationRequired: This is a sensitive operation and requires recent authentication. Please log in again before retrying.
security.passwordLengthError: Password must be at least 6 characters.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.description: Receive emails about your account activity.

promotions.title: Marketing emails
promotions.description: Receive emails about new products, features, and promotions.

security.title: Security alerts
security.description: Receive emails about security alerts on your account.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of your dashboard.

kyc.title: Identity Verification
kyc.step1_desc: To secure your account and comply with regulations, we need to verify your identity. This process is quick and secure.
kyc.step1_item1: A valid government-issued photo ID (Passport, ID Card).
kyc.step1_item2: A recent photo of yourself (selfie) to upload.
kyc.step1_item3: A recent proof of address (utility bill, bank statement).
kyc.step2_desc: Please choose the type of document you want to use and upload a clear picture of it.
kyc.step3_desc: Please upload a recent utility bill or bank statement showing your name and the address you provided during registration.
kyc.step4_desc: Please upload a clear, recent photo of yourself. Make sure your face is clearly visible. Do not wear hats or sunglasses.
kyc.step5_desc: Thank you for submitting your documents. We are now reviewing your information. Processing time is usually 24 to 48 hours. We will notify you once the process is complete.
kyc.unverified_description: To access this feature, you need to complete your identity verification first. It's a quick and secure process to protect your account.

notFound.title: Oops! Page not found.
notFound.description: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.
